snippet.title: Minecraft Dungeons Diaries: Lore
snippet.description: Minecraft Dungeons is a new action-adventure game set in the Minecraft Universe. In the final episode we’re taking a close look at the lore, which is the game’s backstory. Find out what introducing a new mob in Minecraft Dungeons means for Vanilla, what (or who!) the main narrative driver is, and which part of the story is the team’s favorite.
